The claim is made by Marjorie Dannenfels: president of the Susan B. Anthony List, an organization that advocates for pro-life legislation.
The claim states that Planned Parenthood: raked in more than $300 million in profits over the past four years."
The claim is in response to U: S. Rep. Debbie Wasserman Schultz calling the GOP "anti-women" after the vote to de-fund Planned Parenthood.
The claim suggests that 54: of Americans do not want to contribute to an organization they don't believe in through their taxes.
